title: Bug 14943Code Assist does not respect platform line ends
description: Bug 14943Code Assist does not respect platform line ends
OB: When using code assist to create a for loop with a temporary variable, the resulting code has LF as linefeeds on a Windows machine.
SR:
1. Open the code editor on a Windows machine.
2. Use code assist to create a for loop with a temporary variable.
3. Observe the linefeeds in the resulting code.
